message_1: What is the order of the point (5,1) on the elliptic curve defined by y^2 = x^3 + 7 over a finite field with 31 elements?
message_2:

We will use the elliptic curve point addition and doubling formulas to perform the calculations. Since the field has 31 elements, all calculations will be done modulo 31.

λ = (3 * x1^2 + a) / (2 * y1) mod p
ν = (λ^2 - 2 * x1) mod p
